column4: okay... i just used the upgrade manager to get 7.10. i got one question though... it says it going to remove ndiswrapper-source. wont i loose my internett connection then?
okay... i just used the upgrade manager to get 7.10. i got one question though... it says it going to remove ndiswrapper-source. wont i loose my internett connection then?
I think there is some discussion on the launchpad page about ndiswrapper. But the source package won't affect you since it has actual source code, you know, .c and .h files which you do not use.
bwlang remember that justinato is inexperienced. Better give him good, precise information, or no information at all. Don't confuse him.
